channel.title: The Cloudflare Blog
channel.description: Get the latest news on how products at Cloudflare are built, technologies used, and join the teams helping to build a better Internet.

item.title: 【Cloudflare outage on February 20, 2026】Cloudflare 于 2026 年 2 月 20 日中断
item.description: 【 Cloudflare suffered a service outage on February 20, 2026. A subset of customers who use Cloudflare’s Bring Your Own IP (BYOIP) service saw their routes to the Internet withdrawn via Border Gateway Protocol (BGP). 】Cloudflare 于 2026 年 2 月 20 日遭遇服务中断。使用 Cloudflare 自带 IP (BYOIP) 服务的部分客户发现他们的互联网路由通过边界网关协议 (BGP) 被撤回。

item.title: 【Code Mode: give agents an entire API in 1,000 tokens】代码模式：以 1,000 个代币为代理提供完整的 API
item.description: 【 The Cloudflare API has over 2,500 endpoints. Exposing each one as an MCP tool would consume over 2 million tokens. With Code Mode, we collapsed all of it into two tools and roughly 1,000 tokens of context. 】Cloudflare API 拥有超过 2,500 个端点。将每个工具公开为 MCP 工具将消耗超过 200 万个代币。通过代码模式，我们将所有内容折叠成两个工具和大约 1,000 个上下文标记。

item.title: 【Shedding old code with ecdysis: graceful restarts for Rust services at Cloudflare】通过 ecdysis 摆脱旧代码：Cloudflare 的 Rust 服务优雅重启
item.description: 【 ecdysis is a Rust library enabling zero-downtime upgrades for network services. After five years protecting millions of connections at Cloudflare, it’s now open source. 】ecdysis 是一个 Rust 库，可实现网络服务的零停机升级。五年来保护了 Cloudflare 的数百万个连接，现在它已开源。

item.title: 【Introducing Markdown for Agents】为代理商推出 Markdown
item.description: 【 The way content is discovered online is shifting, from traditional search engines to AI agents that need structured data from a Web built for humans. It’s time to consider not just human visitors, but start to treat agents as first-class citizens. Markdown for Agents automatically converts any HTML page requested from our network to markdown. 】在线发现内容的方式正在发生转变，从传统的搜索引擎转向需要来自为人类构建的网络的结构化数据的人工智能代理。现在不仅要考虑人类访客，还要开始将特工视为一等公民。 Markdown for Agents 会自动将从我们网络请求的任何 HTML 页面转换为 Markdown。

item.title: 【2025 Q4 DDoS threat report: A record-setting 31.4 Tbps attack caps a year of massive DDoS assaults】2025 年第 4 季度 DDoS 威胁报告：创纪录的 31.4 Tbps 攻击终结了这一年的大规模 DDoS 攻击
item.description: 【 The number of DDoS attacks more than doubled in 2025. The network layer is under particular threat as hyper-volumetric attacks grew 700%. 】2025 年，DDoS 攻击数量增加了一倍多。随着超容量攻击增长 700%，网络层受到特别威胁。

item.title: 【Improve global upload performance with R2 Local Uploads】使用 R2 本地上传提高全局上传性能
item.description: 【 Local Uploads on R2 reduces request duration for uploads by up to 75%. It writes object data to a nearby location and asynchronously copies it to your bucket, all while data is available immediately. 】R2 上的本地上传可将上传请求持续时间缩短高达 75%。它将对象数据写入附近的位置并将其异步复制到您的存储桶，同时数据立即可用。

item.title: 【Google’s AI advantage: why crawler separation is the only path to a fair Internet】谷歌的AI优势：为什么爬虫分离是通往公平互联网的唯一途径
item.description: 【 Google's dual-purpose crawler creates an unfair AI advantage. To protect publishers and foster competition, the UK’s Competition and Markets Authority must mandate crawler separation for search and AI. 】谷歌的两用爬虫创造了不公平的人工智能优势。为了保护出版商并促进竞争，英国竞争和市场管理局必须强制执行搜索和人工智能爬虫分离。

item.title: 【Building vertical microfrontends on Cloudflare’s platform】在 Cloudflare 平台上构建垂直微前端
item.description: 【 Deploy multiple Workers under a single domain with the ability to make them feel like single-page applications. We take a look at how service bindings enable URL path routing to multiple projects. 】在单个域下部署多个 Worker，能够使它们感觉像单页应用程序。我们来看看服务绑定如何启用 URL 路径路由到多个项目。

item.title: 【Introducing Moltworker: a self-hosted personal AI agent, minus the minis】Moltworker 简介：一个自托管的个人人工智能代理，减去迷你
item.description: 【 Moltworker is a middleware Worker and adapted scripts that allows running OpenClaw (formerly Moltbot, formerly Clawdbot) on Cloudflare's Sandbox SDK and our Developer Platform APIs. So you can self-host an AI personal assistant — without any new hardware. 】Moltworker 是一个中间件 Worker 和改编脚本，允许在 Cloudflare 的 Sandbox SDK 和我们的开发者平台 API 上运行 OpenClaw（以前称为 Moltbot、以前称为 Clawdbot）。因此，您可以自行托管人工智能个人助理——无需任何新硬件。

item.title: 【Building a serverless, post-quantum Matrix homeserver】构建无服务器、后量子 Matrix 家庭服务器
item.description: 【 As a proof of concept, we built a Matrix homeserver to Cloudflare Workers — delivering encrypted messaging at the edge with automatic post-quantum cryptography. 】作为概念验证，我们为 Cloudflare Workers 构建了一个 Matrix 家庭服务器 - 使用自动后量子加密技术在边缘提供加密消息传递。
